docs.title: 🚀 Getting Started
docs.text: A digital washing experience in just a few steps.

docs.title: 1️⃣ Download & Register
docs.text:
• Download the washMaster app in the App Store or Play Store.
  • Register & Login in the washMaster app.

docs.title: 2️⃣ Payment Method
docs.text:
• Download a payment method.
  • If no direct payment is available, top up your prepaid credit.

docs.title: 3️⃣ Reserve Machine
docs.text:
• You will see in the app whether a machine is free.
  • If your operator has released the reservation function, you can also easily reserve machines in the app.

docs.title: 4️⃣ Pay with Smartphone
docs.text:
• Place your washing in the machine.
  • Scan the QR code and select the wash programme you want.
  • Confirm the payment directly in the app. The machine will then start the programme you have selected.
